sub_title: Medical Publication Manager at Excerpta Medica BV - Adelphi Group
summary: I am a medical publications manager responsible for the development of a wide variety of high-quality publications, both with direct writing experience and by overseeing and critically reviewing freelancers works. Also experienced in hosting and leading client calls and liaising with pharmaceutical clients and KOLs, as well as providing assistance in publication planning.
